doc.title: Stalked
doc.plot: Aleksandar (Jorgo Ognenovski) is running for his life after escaping the Bosnian War. He looks up his friend, Ben (Nick Hill), in the US to start a new life. He starts a romance with Ben's beautiful sister Jillian (Lisa Marie Wilson) but quickly gets framed for murder. He has to clear his name and prove the town's mayor is corrupt before he is killed by the bounty men.
